events.text: Runner, we are not as evil as to send you out there without any means of attack.
You can vomit the magic you unwillingly ingest by causing an explosion around you. Feel free to try it out with that Flesh Stump over there...
[i]Press [wave amp=50 freq=2]Z[/wave] to attack. Doing so will deplete one magic bar, you can use this to reduce your speed[/i]
